company.name: Figure Markets
company.tagline: Real Yield. Real Assets. Real Ownership.
company.description: A vertically integrated capital markets trading platform offering cryptocurrency trading, yield-bearing stablecoins (YLDS), crypto-backed loans, and real-world asset tokenization. Built on Provenance Blockchain with decentralized custody and SEC-registered securities.
company.industry: Fintech / Decentralized Finance / Digital Asset Management

target_audience.primary: Retail crypto investors seeking institutional-grade yields and regulated products

key_messages: Real Yield, Real Assets, Real Ownership
Institutional quality yields now accessible to everyone
Decentralized custody - you control your assets
company.founded_by: Mike Cagney (Co-Founder of SoFi), June Ou

key_products.name: YLDS
key_products.description: SEC-registered yield-bearing stablecoin paying SOFR minus 50bps

key_products.name: Democratized Prime
key_products.description: Yield backed by HELOC pools, including AAA-rated HELOC+

key_products.name: Figure Exchange
key_products.description: Trading platform for crypto, HASH, and tokenized RWAs

key_products.name: Crypto-Backed Loans
key_products.description: Lowest fixed rates with decentralized MPC wallet custody

primary.name: Figure Indigo
primary.usage: Brand backgrounds, hero sections, marketing materials, app backgrounds

colors.palette_mood: Professional fintech with crypto-native energy. The indigo-violet spectrum conveys trust, innovation, and premium positioning. Monochromatic purple treatments in 3D renders create cohesive brand recognition across marketing materials. The palette bridges institutional finance credibility with Web3 modernity.

typography.style_notes: Inter provides clarity and modernity appropriate for fintech. The wordmark 'FIGURE' uses generous letter-spacing to convey premium positioning. Headlines use tight negative tracking for impact. Financial data uses tabular figures for alignment.

visual_style.overall_aesthetic: Premium fintech meets Web3 - institutional credibility with modern digital asset energy. Monochromatic purple 3D renders, glassmorphism, and clean UI create cohesive visual identity.

imagery.photography: Minimal - brand relies on 3D renders and abstract visuals
imagery.illustration_style: 3D rendered scenes with monochromatic purple/lavender palette
illustration_examples: YLDS coin as 3D glass token with glow effects
Metaphorical scenes (keys unlocking doors, coins floating)

motion.duration: 200-300ms for UI, longer for hero animations

buttons.primary: White or light background, dark text, 8px radius, subtle shadow on hover
buttons.secondary: Transparent with border, text matches primary color
buttons.ghost: No background, text only with hover underline
buttons.states: Hover: slight lift/shadow. Focus: ring outline. Disabled: 50% opacity

cards.style: Dark glass effect with subtle border, 12px radius

brand_voice.language_style: Clear, direct financial language made accessible. Avoids crypto jargon when possible, explains complex concepts simply. Emphasizes regulatory compliance and institutional backing.

personality_traits.innovative: First-mover positioning (first SEC stablecoin, first AAA rating)

primary_mark.description: Stylized 'F' constructed from geometric rectangular blocks
primary_mark.clear_space: Minimum padding equal to height of bottom F bar

ylds_coin.description: Stylized Y with geometric construction, often rendered as 3D glass coin

extraction_metadata.confidence_notes: Strong consistency across all 5 images - monochromatic purple palette confirmed across logo, marketing materials, and 3D renders. Website content provides detailed company information, product descriptions, and tone examples. The YLDS coin and F logo mark are clearly defined brand assets. Typography identified as Inter from visual analysis (standard fintech choice). Component styles inferred from product UI visible in marketing material.

web3_signals.positioning: Regulated DeFi - bridging traditional finance compliance (SEC, S&P ratings) with Web3 infrastructure
web3_signals.regulatory_approach: Compliance-first: SEC-registered securities, AAA S&P ratings, FINRA membership
